DAO

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.DAO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthTokenDAO, EventDAO, PersonDAO, UserDAO

    public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class of all DAO objects. initialize() initializes all child DAO objects shares the same connection among all dao classes
